name: Archer of Ages
description:
*The checkpoint system only works on downloaded games, not on the in browser version

Archer, Zeus needs your help!!!

Defend Zeus's Marble Head from waves of enemies in Three action packed Levels! Featuring Original musical Score, Voice over, 3 unique Boss Fights, and 3 legendary Bows!

Controls:
Move Mouse Courser to Aim bow
Left-click / space: Charges bow power; release to shoot

Right-click/ ctrl : Triple-Shot (once unlocked)
Enter: Open Pause Menu

Pause menu controls:
Enter: Choose Option
Up/Down Arrows: Select Option
